title: Appointing a Cabinet Sub-Committee to study the issues relating to salary anomalies in the Teachers’ and Principals’ Services
decision_details:
- The Cabinet conducted lengthy discussions in relation to the current situation occurred with regard to salary anomalies in the Teachers’ and Principals’ Services. Accordingly, the Cabinet decided to appoint a Cabinet Sub-Committee comprising of the following Ministers to further examine the matter, taking into consideration all relevant factors in this regard and submit the same to the Cabinet for consideration: 

	*	Hon. Dullas Alahapperuma,
		Minister of Power 

	*	Hon. Wimal Weerawansa,
		Minister of Industries

	*	Hon. Mahinda Amaraweera,
		Minister of Environment

	*	Hon. Prasanna Ranatunga,
		Minister of Tourism.
